EmailTemplate.name: 06-29-22 BNK ATMaaS Email 3.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Infographic: Making ATM as a Service work for you
EmailTemplate.textOnly: When you choose NCR’s ATM as a Service, you can confidently hand off every element of your ATM network. ATM as a Service covers everything including deployment, security, compliance, cash and reporting. By working with a trusted partner, you benefit from greater efficiencies and free your resources to focus on what matters most, your customers. Download our latest infographic to learn more. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
